timeline.bodyText:
Not a fan of the name that LongUnaryOperator forces sub-classes to use (applyAsLong) - it's not very readable and clear as to what is being overridden.  Do we really need the syntactic sugar features that the functional comosition provides?  i.e. will we ever actually use them?
For readability I would prefer a non-extending interface with one method calculateNextGasTarget so it reads clearly what is going on in subclasses.
